name: Mona
description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title.

skillTalents.name: Ripple of Fate
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.
Trọng Kích
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
Nhảy Dậm
Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

upgrades.name: Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Reflection of Doom
skillTalents.description:
Creates an illusory Phantom of fate from coalesced waterspouts.

The Phantom has the following special properties:

Continuously taunts nearby enemies, attracting their fire.
Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby enemies.
When its Thời Gian Kéo Dài expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

Nhấn Giữ
Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom.

Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.

skillTalents.name: Stellaris Phantasm
skillTalents.description:
Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE.
Illusory Bubble
Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile. When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, the following effects are produced:

Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it.
Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro Elemental DMG in the process. The DMG Bonus does not apply to the Hydro Elemental DMG dealt in this instance.

Omen
During its Thời Gian Kéo Dài, increases DMG taken by enemies.

upgrades.name: Illusory Bubble Thời Gian Kéo Dài

skillTalents.name: Illusory Torrent
skillTalents.description:
Alternate Spirit
Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly.

When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water.

Applies the Wet status to nearby enemies when she reappears.

passiveTalents.name: Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!
passiveTalents.description:
After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any enemies nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.
A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its Sát Thương Nổ is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.

passiveTalents.name: Waterborne Destiny
passiveTalents.description: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

passiveTalents.name: Principium of Astrology
passiveTalents.description: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.description:
The effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s after a character hits an enemy affected by an Omen:
Lôi-Charged DMG is increased by 15%.
Vaporize DMG is increased by 15%.
Hydro Swirl DMG is increased by 15%.
The Thời Gian Kéo Dài for which enemies are Frozen is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.description:
When a Tấn công thường hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Trọng Kích.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.description: When a character attacks an enemy affected by the Omen status effect, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.description:
Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gain a 60% increase to the DMG her next Trọng Kích per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.
